# iosxr_tacacs_source_interface (Resource)

This resource can manage the TACACS Source Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_tacacs_source_interface" "example" {
  source_interface = "MgmtEth0/RP0/CPU0/0"
  source_interfaces = [
    {
      vrf       = "VRF1"
      interface = "MgmtEth0/RP0/CPU0/0"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TACACS+ packets
- `source_interfaces` (Attributes List) VRF for this source interface configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--source_interfaces))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--source_interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `source_interfaces`

Required:

- `interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TACACS+ packets
- `vrf` (String) Name of the VRF

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_tacacs_source_interface.example ""
```
